desc: Pēpi Collection designs eco friendly reusable cloth nappies for babies. Our nappies are pocket nappies that come with an absorbent bamboo insert. We aim to reduce household waste and spread awareness about the benefits of reusable cloth nappies and to make change time fun & stylish.

layout.text: "absolutely AMAZING absorbency. My son did a solid 4 hours and nowhere near capacity. I imagine they can go to the 6 hour mark, even more!" "....a really really nice nappy to have...FANTASTIC quality, blown away by the inserts" "recommend if you have a big wetter and need some really really good absorbency....I really really like it!"
